body.name: Magnetic Color and Number Maze, Wooden Magnetic Maze Puzzles Montessori Toys for 3+ Year Old, Toddler Activities Counting & Color Sorting Fine Motor Skills Learning Toys for Kids Preschoolers Ages 3-5

features: Magnetic Matching Maze: This wooden magnetic maze Montessori toy is designed with 10 different colored "baskets" and 65 small balls. Each colored basket is marked with different numbers. Kids need to use the included magnetic wand to attract and move the magnetic balls under the transparent panel and place them into the correct basket to complete the matching maze game.

Safe and Clutter-Free: This magnetic color and number matching maze toy is equipped with a sturdy transparent acrylic panel, and all the small balls are securely sealed underneath the panel. Additionally, the magnetic wand is attached to the toy with a string, so you don't have to worry about the risk of your kid accidentally swallowing small parts. After your toddler completes the matching maze game, you also don’t need to tidy up and organize the toy.

Learning Toy that Helps Children Grow: This magnetic color and number maze toy for 3+ year old helps toddlers and preschoolers practice counting and develop their recognition of colors and numbers. In addition, the novel and unique "basketball shooting" maze game can help kids and toddlers stay focused during play, and improve their fine motor skills and problem-solving abilities.

Child-Friendly Design: This maze toy is made of high-quality natural wood and non-toxic water-based paint, with smooth edges and corners to ensure the safety of young children. Its appropriate and portable size allows it to be easily packed into a backpack and makes it an essential travel toy for kids ages 3-5.

Looking for a great gift idea for kids and toddlers? Look no further than our magnetic maze puzzle board for 3-5 year old. This maze puzzle Montessori toy is perfect for gifting and is sure to be loved by both the parents and the child. Our magnetic matching maze is the perfect choice for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion that requires a thoughtful gift. Give the gift of fun and learning with our magnetic color and number matching maze.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Unlock the world of imagination and learning for your child with our magnetic maze toy Looking for a fantastic gift idea? Look no further than our Magnetic Maze Puzzle Board. It's a thoughtful and engaging present that both parents and children will love. Whether it's a birthday, holiday, or any special occasion, our magnetic matching maze makes for an ideal gift. Give the gift of fun, learning, and endless possibilities with our Magnetic Color and Number Maze. unlock the world of imagination and learning for your child with our magnetic maze toy now.

Unlock the world of imagination and learning for your child with our magnetic maze toy Looking for a fantastic gift idea? Look no further than our Magnetic Maze Puzzle Board. It's a thoughtful and engaging present that both parents and children will love. Whether it's a birthday, holiday, or any special occasion, our magnetic matching maze makes for an ideal gift. Give the gift of fun, learning, and endless possibilities with our Magnetic Color and Number Maze. unlock the world of imagination and learning for your child with our magnetic maze toy now.

Aitey Magnetic Color and Number Maze: A Fun and Educational Toy for Kids! Enhance your child's learning experience with our Magnetic Color and Number Maze. This Montessori-inspired wooden toy is designed to engage children aged 3 and above in an exciting matching maze game, promoting cognitive development and problem-solving skills while having fun.

Featuring 10 vibrant colored "baskets" marked with different numbers, this maze toy comes with 65 small magnetic balls. Using the included magnetic wand, children can attract and move the balls under the transparent acrylic panel, placing them into the correct basket to complete the maze. Watch as your little one develops their counting skills, color recognition, and hand-eye coordination through this interactive and engaging activity.

Our Magnetic Color and Number Maze goes beyond just being entertaining; it's a valuable learning tool. As children engage in the "basketball shooting" maze game, they develop focus, fine motor skills, and problem-solving abilities. This educational toy is an excellent addition to any home or classroom, providing hours of engaging and meaningful play. Our Magnetic Color and Number Maze promotes a clutter-free environment. Once your toddler completes the maze game, there's no need to tidy up and organize the toy. The balls remain neatly sealed within the transparent panel, making cleanup a breeze for parents. Spend more quality time with your child and less time worrying about messes.

Crafted from high-quality natural wood and painted with non-toxic water-based paint, designed with smooth edges and corners, this maze toy ensures the safety of young children. The magnetic wand is thoughtfully attached to the toy with a string, eliminating the risk of small parts being swallowed or lost. The sturdy transparent panel ensures that all the small balls are securely sealed, preventing any choking hazards. The samll balls which under the transparent acrylic panel can be easily attracted and moved by using the magnetic wand. Please note that Keep the magnetic wand upright for better use

Portable Size, Easy to Carry, Perfect Travel Toys for Kids Its portable size allows for easy packing into a backpack, making it the perfect travel companion for kids aged 3 to 5. Take the learning and fun wherever you go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprizingly entertaining toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice wood, attached magnetic wand, and sealed bead case. Fun for adults too when they have too much time on their hands waiting for someone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The stick sucks
reviews.reviewText: Great quality except for the magnet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my toddler
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves this toy. Great for fine motor skills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We love it. We felt the magnet is plenty strong, despite what others have said.We have brought it along for restaurants and car rides. It did get thrown and the backing is starting to separate, but nothing a little wood glue can't fix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for counting and color lessons
reviews.reviewText: Great toy! Solidly built with a plexiglass cover that is very difficult to break. Comes with a small magnetic stylus attached so that it doesn't get lost. Great for all ages!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved the idea of this but on day 2 of playing with it, I noticed my toddler was carrying the small beads around in his mouth. After further inspection i realized that the back of it was coming off, allowing the balls to fall out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for fine motor for kids 4 and older
reviews.reviewText: Great for fine motor for kids 4 and olderToo small of beads and too many for kids younger than 4/5, but a good toy to occupy them, especially for car rides!
